name.en: Seminar on Ethnic Politics and Culture
name.ch: 族群政治與文化專題研究

department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程旨在理解族群和國族認同的基本概念及理論，分析歷史發展及其在現代社會中的表現，並聚焦於東亞民族主義，探討族群認同與國族建構之間的關係及其影響。通過多面向的視角，了解族群與國族的形成過程、動態變化以及其對社會與政治的影響。課程將通過經典研讀、討論和案例研究來幫助學生深化對這些議題的理解與獨立研究的能力。
goal.en: This course explores the concepts of ethnic politics and culture, their historical development, and their manifestations in contemporary society. It focuses on East Asia nationalism， through a multidisciplinary perspective,  students will understand the formation processes of ethnic and national identities, their dynamic changes, and their impact on society and politics. The course will utilize classical readings, discussions, and case studies to help students deepen their understanding of these issues and develop independent research skills.

outline.ch:
1.導論: 基本概念
2.想像共同體建構
3      民族主義＆族群
4.近代中國國族想像
5.台灣國家認同論述
6.台灣族群認同與政治動員
7.逃離中國：現代臺灣的創傷、記憶與認同
8.民族主義的文化政治
9.電影與媒體中的族群想像
10.文學中的認同政治
11.後殖民主義與全球化
12.族群、國家治理、與新秩序的建構
outline.en:
Introduction: Basic Concepts
Imagined Communities: Origin ＆ Spread of Nationalism
 Ethnicity and Nationalism
Origins of Modern Nationalism
National Imaginations in Modern China
Discourse on National Identity in Taiwan
Ethnic Identity and Political Mobilization in Taiwan
Escaping China: Trauma, Memory, and Identity in Modern
Taiwan
The Cultural Politics of Nationalism
Ethnic Imagination in Film and Media
Identity Politics ＆ Literature in Taiwan
 Postcolonialism 、Globalization and Nationalism
Ethnicity, State Governance, and the Construction of New
Orders
